fail_on_warnings.description: Whether to fail the build if there are warnings

fail_on_errors.description: Whether to fail the build if there are errors

log_errors.description: Whether to log information about fixes

fixes.description: Object, that details which automatic fixes to apply

remove_bom.description: Whether to remove BOM (Byte Order Mark) from files

fix_property_types.description: Whether to fix incorrect values for range and default in entity properties

checks.description: Object to enable/disable individual sanity checks. `all_checks` can be used as a global override.

all_checks.description: Global override for all checks; if present it will be applied to all toggles, but individual toggles may override it.

find_bom_bp.description: Enable/disable BOM (Byte Order Mark) detection/removal in the BP pack.

find_bom_rp.description: Enable/disable BOM (Byte Order Mark) detection/removal in the RP pack.

folder_misspellings_bp.description: Check for misspelled or unexpected folders inside the BP pack.

folder_misspellings_rp.description: Check for misspelled or unexpected folders inside the RP pack.

file_misspellings_bp.description: Check for misspelled or missing files referenced by the BP pack.

file_misspellings_rp.description: Check for misspelled or missing files referenced by the RP pack.

incorrect_language_names_bp.description: Validate language file names (e.g. en_US.lang) in the BP pack.

incorrect_language_names_rp.description: Validate language file names (e.g. en_US.lang) in the RP pack.

missing_translations_bp.description: Detect missing translation keys across language files in the BP pack.

missing_translations_rp.description: Detect missing translation keys across language files in the RP pack.

incorrect_property_types.description: Check and optionally fix incorrect property types in BP entity JSON files.

duplicated_recipe_ids.description: Detect duplicated recipe identifiers across BP recipe JSON files.

unsupported_sound_files.description: Detect sound files in RP/sounds with unsupported extensions.

missing_sounds.description: Detect sound definitions that reference missing sound files in the RP pack.
